product_name: Nike Vapen Boa Snowboard Boots - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: Perfect for all-mountain excursions, the women's Nike Vapen Boa snowboarding boots feature a soft flex and running shoe comfort to keep your feet happy lap after lap. Boa(R) Coiler lacing system, with ankle and cable guides along entire edge of eyestays, distributes closure force evenly for a dialed-in fit that won't loosen up. High-end synthetic waterproof leather uppers keep feet dry; full-length internal backstays give boots a soft flex for light support and control. Neoprene flex zones at ankles encourage forward flex so you can rip big turns and control your edges. Custom moldable, polyethylene and EVA foam liners offer comfort and warmth, and feature internal lacing harnesses to keep the heels locked down; neoprene toes for comfort. Warming Blanket Strobel is a heat reflective material in both the shell and liner that helps retain heat and keep the cold out. The Nike Vapen Boa snowboard boots feature ZF1 full-length phylon midsoles/outsoles that are well-cushioned for superior comfort when on your board and when walking around.
short_description: Perfect for all-mountain excursions, the women's Nike Vapen Boa snowboarding boots feature a soft flex and running shoe comfort to keep your feet happy lap after lap.
